physical_appearance: This is a silver headdress. It is decorated elaborately with dozens of diamonds. The curved middle section is designed to fit the head, with 21 arms of coiled wire springs attached to it. At the end of each wire, there are dozens of diamonds arranged in a floral shape. There are several suspended diamonds hanging as pendants from these flowers. The wire coils are slightly rusty.
title_text: Wedding Headdress with en Tremble Diamante Settings
subject_terms_1: folk costume wedding clothes floral (motif) customs (social concepts)
subject_terms_2: Headdresses Ethnic costume Wedding costume Motifs Manners and customs Malays (Asian people)
